events.name: onSmartBlockEmbedUnblock
events.description: Event used to pass an unblock message to a smartblock shim

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: The id of the tab where the shim is running

parameters.name: shimId
parameters.description: The shim which should be unblocked

events.name: onSmartBlockEmbedReblock
events.description: Event used to pass an reblock message to a smartblock shim

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: The id of the tab where the shim is running

parameters.name: shimId
parameters.description: The shim which should be reblocked

functions.name: isDFPIActive
functions.description: Returns whether dFPI is active for private/non-private browsing tabs

functions.name: shim
functions.description: Set specified URL patterns as intended to be shimmed

parameters.name: allowlistId
parameters.description: Identfier for the allow-list, so it may be added-to or revoked

parameters.name: notHosts
parameters.description: Hosts on which to not shim these patterns

functions.name: allow
functions.description: Set specified URL patterns as intended to be allowed through the content blocker for the specified top hosts

parameters.name: allowlistId
parameters.description: Identfier for the allow-list, so it may be added-to or revoked

parameters.name: hosts
parameters.description: Hosts to allow the patterns on

functions.name: revoke
functions.description: Revokes the given allow-list entirely (both shims and allows)

functions.name: wasRequestUnblocked
functions.description: Whether the given requestId was unblocked by any allowList

functions.name: openProtectionsPanel
functions.description: Sends an observer message to open the protections panel on the window specified by the tab id

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: the webcompat tab id of the calling tab, used to get the correct window

functions.name: getSmartBlockEmbedFluentString
functions.description: Gets the fluent strings used for the smartblock placeholder embed

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: the webcompat tab id of the calling tab, used to get the correct window

parameters.name: shimId
parameters.description: the shimId of the calling shim, used for getting the correct embed name

parameters.name: websiteHost
parameters.description: the hostname of the website, displayed on the placeholder button
